paper_abstract: The Computer Laboratory, University of Cambridge hosted a workshop on "Internet on the Move" on September 22, 2012. The objective of the workshop was to bring academia, industry and regulators to discuss the challenges in realizing the notion of ubiquitous mobile Internet. The editorial summarises a general overview of the issues discussed on enabling universal mobile coverage and some of the solutions that have been proposed to alleviate the problem of having ubiquitous mobile connectivity.
paper_title: Internet on the Move: Challenges and Solutions
